thread.title: Ted Cruz Only Needs 7 Words to Put Conservatives at Ease Over Travel Ban…
thread.title_full: Ted Cruz Only Needs 7 Words to Put Conservatives at Ease Over Travel Ban…

author: EdJenner
title: Ted Cruz Only Needs 7 Words to Put Conservatives at Ease Over Travel Ban…
text:
Go to Article 
Earlier tonight, the 9th Circuit Court of Appeals upheld the suspension of President Trump’s travel ban, which bars entry for people from seven Muslim-majority nations until authorities can put together better vetting procedures. Right after, Trump sent this blistering message… SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE! — Donald J.
